snippet: A former Colorado Springs police chief has been hired to lead the police department in Sanford, Fla., where Trayvon Martin was killed.
abstract: Richard W Meyers, former police chief in Colorado Springs, is hired to lead the police department in Sanford, Fla, where Trayvon Martin was killed.
lead_paragraph: A former Colorado Springs police chief has been hired to lead the police department in Sanford, Fla., where Trayvon Martin was killed.

headline.seo: Sanford Police Get New Chief After Trayvon Martin Case
headline.main: Interim Police Chief Named for Agency in Martin Case
headline.print_headline: Interim Police Chief Named For Agency in Martin Case
